description: ff. 325. 317 x 211; 240 x 130 mm. 33 lin. Rabīʻ I, 1124. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 448 (commentary a) and S I, 620 erroneously attributed to the commentator's father ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى بصرنا بالصراط المستقىم
author: Ibn Malak, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf, 14th/15th cent
title: Sharḥ al-Maṣābīḥ.
creator: Ibn Malak, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf, 14th/15th cent
subject: Baghawī, al-ḥusayn ibn Masʻūd, d. 1117?—Maṣābīḥ al-sunnah
